title: Horvath’s heroics stun Leeds as Sheffield Wednesday pull off Carabao Cup shock
summary: Sheffield Wednesday advanced past Leeds in the Carabao Cup after a 3-0 victory in the shootout, following a 1-1 draw in regular time. The standout performer was their goalkeeper, who saved two penalties. This win secured their place in the next round of the tournament.

title: US Open tennis day three: Sinner and Swiatek through, Boulter and Kartal exit – live
summary: The article discusses the opening matches of two favorite teams in a tournament. Writers will provide updates and insights on their performances. Readers can expect analysis and commentary as the matches unfold.

title: Celtic and Leeds both beaten: Champions League and Carabao Cup clockwatch – as it happened
summary: Kairat Almaty defeated Celtic 3-2 on penalties following a scoreless draw. Meanwhile, Leeds faced a 3-0 loss to Sheffield Wednesday. Both teams were eliminated from their respective competitions.

title: Burning Man attendees face more weather woes as thunderstorms loom
summary: Visitors attending Nevada's annual festival in the desert are facing challenging conditions due to heavy winds and dust storms. The adverse weather has created difficulties for festival-goers, impacting their experience. Organizers are monitoring the situation as conditions evolve.
